author: francescobrivio
body:
Addresses https://github.com/cms-data/DQM-Integration/issues/3

#### PR Description
- This PR adds new streamer files for `streamDQMOnlineBeamspot` used in the unitTest of the `beamhlt` client
  - The LSs added are from run 370580 ([OMS link](https://cmsoms.cern.ch/cms/runs/report?cms_run=370580&cms_run_sequence=GLOBAL-RUN)) from 2023 pp collisions
  - The old run (356383) is left untouched as it is still useful to debug https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43108
- Updated README to reflect this addition

#### PR Validation
Successfully ran locally the `beamhlt` unitTest with the new streamer files
title: Add DQMOnlineBeamspot streamer files for run 370580
